alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 29 at 5:20PM MDT until September 29 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Sioux County in northwestern Iowa... Northwestern Plymouth County in northwestern Iowa... Southeastern Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Union County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 620 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hawarden, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hawarden and Ireton around 625 PM CDT. Hudson around 635 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
